home.title: Your intelligent
home.subtitle: Pusho guides you through every workout, corrects your technique in real-time, and connects you with a community of motivated athletes like you.
home.featuresSubtitle: Smart tools and a community that pushes you to your best
home.feature1Desc: Artificial intelligence analyzes every movement and gives you instant feedback to perfect your technique.
home.feature2Desc: No more half reps. The app validates every push-up and helps you build correct habits.
home.feature3Desc: See how much you've improved. Clear stats showing your journey from first push-ups to personal records.
home.feature4Desc: Ready-made or personalized workout plans. Whether you're a beginner or an athlete, there's a path for you.
home.feature5Desc: Leaderboards, challenges, and training partners. The right motivation comes from others.
home.feature6Desc: Every rep gets a score. Learn to do fewer push-ups, but do them better.
home.step1Desc: Position your phone and let the camera see you. No sensors, no accessories.
home.step2Desc: Follow your program or go freestyle. The AI counts, evaluates, and guides you in real-time.
home.step3Desc: Review your progress, climb the leaderboards, and challenge the community.
home.ctaSubtitle: Download Pusho for free and discover a new way to train.

support.title: Support
support.intro: Need help? We're here for you.
support.contactDesc: For questions, feedback, or technical issues, write to us at:
support.faq1Title: Why does the app need camera access?
support.faq1Desc: Pusho uses the front camera to detect your body position and automatically count push-ups. No images or videos are saved or sent anywhere.
support.faq2Desc: Yes, Pusho is completely free. All features are available with no hidden costs or subscriptions.
support.faq3Title: My push-ups aren't being counted correctly
support.faq3Desc: Make sure you're in a well-lit room and your upper body is fully visible in the camera frame. Position your phone about 3-6 feet away.
support.faq4Desc: Absolutely. Video processing happens entirely on your device. We don't record or send videos to our servers. Your workout data is protected and encrypted.
support.faq5Desc: The leaderboard shows total push-ups from community users. You can filter by period (daily, weekly, monthly) and see your position compared to others.
support.faq6Title: Where can I download the app?
support.faq6Desc: Pusho is available on the App Store for iPhone and Google Play for Android devices. Search for "Pusho" or use the links on the homepage.
support.aboutDesc: Pusho is a fitness app that counts your push-ups in real-time using your device's camera and AI-powered pose detection. No accessories required, just you and your phone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Pusho! This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our mobile application for push-up tracking.
privacy.section1Text: The data controller can be reached at the email address:
privacy.section2_1Intro: To create a Pusho account, we collect:
privacy.section2_1Item1: Email address - For authentication and account communications
privacy.section2_1Item3: Nickname - Unique username displayed in the community (3-20 characters)
privacy.section2_2Item2: Geographic coordinates - Latitude and longitude (manually entered)
privacy.section2_2Item3: Avatar URL - Link to a profile picture
privacy.section2_3Intro: While using the app, we collect:
privacy.section2_3Item1: Push-up count - Number of reps per session
privacy.section2_3Item4: Set details - Reps, quality, and duration for each set
privacy.section2_3Item5: Workout cards - Workout templates used or created
privacy.section2_3Item6: Timestamp - Date and time of each session
privacy.section2_4Item3: Personal record (maximum in a single set)
privacy.section2_5Item1: Videos or images of your workout sessions
privacy.section2_5Item2: Automatic GPS data (location is manual only)
privacy.section4Intro: Pusho uses your device's camera to count push-ups through pose detection. This process:
privacy.section4Item3: Does NOT record videos or images
privacy.section4Item4: Does NOT send video frames to external servers
privacy.section4Item5: Processes frames in real-time in device memory
privacy.section4Text: We use MediaPipe Pose, an open-source library from Google distributed under the Apache 2.0 license. This technology detects key body points (landmarks) to determine position during exercise.
privacy.section5_2Item1: Supabase Inc. - Database and authentication (all account and workout data)
privacy.section5Note1: We do NOT sell your data to third parties.
privacy.section5Note2: We do NOT share data with advertising networks.
privacy.section5Note3: We do NOT use third-party analytics services.
privacy.section6Text1: Your data may be transferred and stored on servers located outside your country of residence, including the United States, where Supabase maintains its infrastructure.
privacy.section6Text2: These transfers comply with applicable data protection regulations, including EU Standard Contractual Clauses where necessary.
privacy.section7Item4: Session tokens - Until logout or expiration
privacy.section8Intro: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data:
privacy.section8Item1: Encryption in transit - All communications occur via HTTPS/TLS
privacy.section8Item2: Password hash - Passwords are stored in irreversible encrypted form
privacy.section8Item3: Session tokens - Secure authentication with expiring tokens
privacy.section8Item4: Limited access - Data is only accessible through authenticated APIs
privacy.section9Intro: If you reside in the European Union, you have the following rights:
privacy.section9Item1: Access - Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.section9Item2: Rectification - Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.section9Item3: Erasure - Request deletion of your data
privacy.section9Item4: Restriction - Restrict processing of your data
privacy.section9Item5: Portability - Receive your data in a structured format
privacy.section9Item6: Objection - Object to processing for legitimate reasons
privacy.section9Text: To exercise your rights, contact us at:
privacy.section9ResponseTime: We will respond within 30 days of receiving your request.
privacy.section10Intro: To request deletion of your account and all associated data:
privacy.section10Step2: Specify the email address associated with the account
privacy.section10Step3: Use "Account deletion request" as the subject
privacy.section10Text: We will proceed with deletion within 30 days of identity verification.
privacy.section11Text: Pusho is not intended for users under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal data from minors. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal data, contact us to request removal.
privacy.section12Item1: Camera (iOS/Android) - Pose detection for push-up counting
privacy.section13Item3: Analytics SDKs (Google Analytics, Firebase Analytics, etc.)
privacy.section14Intro: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. In case of substantial changes:
privacy.section14Item1: We will update the "Last updated" date at the top of the document
privacy.section14Item2: We will notify you via in-app notification or email
privacy.section14Item3: Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance
privacy.section15Text: For questions, requests, or complaints regarding this Privacy Policy:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Pusho! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern the use of the Pusho mobile application ("App", "Service"). By using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not accept these Terms, do not use the App.
terms.section1Intro: Pusho is a free mobile application that allows you to:
terms.section1Item1: Automatically count push-ups using the camera and artificial intelligence
terms.section1Item3: Create and manage personalized workout plans
terms.section1Item4: Participate in community leaderboards and challenges (optional)
terms.section1Item5: Sync data across devices (with registered account)
terms.section2_1Text: You must be at least 16 years old to use Pusho. If you are under 16, you cannot create an account or use the App.
terms.section2_2Intro: To access all features, you need to create an account by providing:
terms.section2_2ResponsibleItem1: Maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials
terms.section2_2ResponsibleItem2: All activities that occur under your account
terms.section2_2ResponsibleItem3: Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized access
terms.section2_3Text: You agree to provide accurate information and keep it updated. You may not impersonate other people or entities.
terms.section3Intro: By using Pusho, you agree NOT to:
terms.section3Item2: Use the App for illegal or unauthorized purposes
terms.section3Item3: Interfere with the operation of the App or servers
terms.section3Item4: Attempt to access other users' accounts
terms.section3Item5: Use offensive, vulgar nicknames or those that violate third-party rights
terms.section3Item7: Use bots, scripts, or automated tools
terms.section3Item8: Collect other users' data without consent
terms.section3Item9: Upload harmful content, viruses, or malware
terms.section3Item10: Harass, intimidate, or harm other users
terms.section3Text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these rules.
terms.section4_1Intro: The App, including design, logo, code, graphics, and content, is protected by intellectual property rights. You may not:
terms.section4_1Item1: Copy, modify, or distribute the App
terms.section4_2Text: You retain ownership of your personal data and workout statistics. You grant us a limited license to process this data to provide the Service.
terms.section5Intro: Pusho is provided "as is" and "as available". We do not guarantee that:
terms.section5Item1: The Service will be uninterrupted or error-free
terms.section5Item2: Results obtained will be accurate or reliable
terms.section5Item3: The App will meet all your expectations
terms.section5Text: We do our best to keep the App running, but interruptions may occur for maintenance, updates, or force majeure.
terms.section6_1Text: To the maximum extent permitted by law, we disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
terms.section6_2Intro: We will not be liable for:
terms.section6_2Item1: Indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages
terms.section6_2Item2: Loss of data, profits, or opportunities
terms.section6_2Item3: Damages arising from use or inability to use the App
terms.section6_3Intro: Important: Pusho is a fitness app and does NOT provide medical advice. Before starting any exercise program:
terms.section6_3Item1: Consult a doctor if you have pre-existing health conditions
terms.section6_3Item2: Listen to your body and don't exceed your limits
terms.section6_3Item3: Stop exercising if you experience pain or discomfort
terms.section6_3Text: Use of the App is at your own risk.
terms.section7_1Text1: You can request deletion of your account at any time by sending an email to
terms.section7_1Text2: Specify the email associated with the account and use "Account deletion request" as the subject. We will process within 30 days.
terms.section7_2Intro: We may suspend or terminate your account:
terms.section7_2Text: In case of termination, you will lose access to data associated with the account.
terms.section8_1Text: We will do our best to communicate significant changes in advance.
terms.section8_2Intro: The Service may be temporarily unavailable due to:
terms.section8_2Item3: Force majeure (natural disasters, cyber attacks, etc.)
terms.section8_2Text: We will not be liable for any Service interruptions.
terms.section9Text1: The processing of your personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, accessible in the App or by contacting
terms.section9Text2: By using the App, you consent to the collection and use of data as described in the Privacy Policy.
terms.section10Intro: We may modify these Terms at any time. In case of substantial changes:
terms.section10Item1: We will update the "Last updated" date
terms.section10Item2: We will notify you via in-App notification or email
terms.section10Item3: Continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance
terms.section10Text: If you do not accept the changes, you must stop using the App.
terms.section11Text: These Terms are governed by Italian law. For any dispute arising from these Terms or use of the App, the Court of Bari shall have exclusive jurisdiction.
terms.section12_1Text: These Terms, together with the Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding use of the App.
terms.section12_2Text: Failure to enforce any provision of these Terms does not constitute a waiver of the right to enforce it in the future.
terms.section12_3Text: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in effect.
terms.section12_4Text: You may not assign your rights or obligations under these Terms without our written consent.
terms.section13Text: For questions about these Terms of Service:
terms.footerNote: By using Pusho, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these Terms of Service.
